original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND b.UserId = u.Id AND c.UserId = u.Id AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-01 19:11:47' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 13:42:51' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.AnswerCount<=4 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND v.VoteTypeId=2 AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-08-02 12:24:29' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-01 19:11:47' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 13:42:51'
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-02 12:24:29'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1.UserId=E6.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E6.PostId=E3.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.VoteTypeId = 2 AND votes.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E6E3.PostId=E5.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E7 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3E5E7 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6E3E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E7 WHERE E1E6E3E5.UserId=E7.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3E5E7E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6E3E5E7 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E6E3E5E7.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.AnswerCount <= 4 AND posts.FavoriteCount >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3E5E7E4E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E6E3E5E7E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E6E3E5E7E4.PostId=E2.Id)
